subject: Tax Evasion
Soccer
Frauds and Swindling
lead_paragraph: A Spanish court charged the Spanish league champion Barcelona with tax fraud of 9.1 million euros ($12.5 million) in last summer’s transfer of the Brazilian forward Neymar.
snippet: A Spanish court charged the Spanish league champion Barcelona with tax fraud of 9.1 million euros ($12.5 million) in last summer’s transfer of the Brazilian forward Neymar.
